```
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
    i := 0
    i = 1
    defer fmt.Println(i)
    i = 2
    defer fmt.Println(i)
    i = 3
    defer fmt.Println(i)
}
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	defer fmt.Println("Defer in main")
	fmt.Println("Stat main")
	f1()
	fmt.Println("Finish main")
}

func f1() {
	defer fmt.Println("Defer in f1")
	fmt.Println("Start f1")
	f2()
	fmt.Println("Finish f1")
}

func f2() {
	defer fmt.Println("Defer in f2")
	fmt.Println("Start f2")
	fmt.Println("Finish f2")
}
```

```
Stat main
Start f1
Start f2
Finish f2
Defer in f2
Finish f1
Defer in f1
Finish main
Defer in main
```
